thread.title: Azerbaijani operating company COP29 presented a new online program
thread.title_full: Azerbaijani operating company COP29 presented a new online program

author: times news cr
title: Azerbaijani operating company COP29 presented a new online program
text:
COP29 presented a new online programâ€/>
Azerbaijan Operating Company COP29 continues its activities to promote sustainable development and fulfill global environmental obligations in the fight against climate change. In this context, Azerbaijan Operating Company COP29 is introducing a new online training program in the field of sustainable development to the general public.
According to Day.Az, the training program, developed by specialists specializing in relevant fields of the Azerbaijan Operating Company COP29, serves to raise awareness of environmental and social sustainability, entrepreneurship, inclusion and various other topics. The program aims to provide basic understanding and knowledge in the lead-up to COP29, focusing on the role of every citizen in building a sustainable and inclusive future, promoting public awareness in this direction, and promoting the development and implementation of relevant skills at COP29 and beyond.
Anyone who wants to benefit from the online learning program can join by registering in the appropriate section of the Eduaz online learning platform. Video instructions on registration can be viewed at this link. For questions that may arise in connection with the training program, you can contact us at +994 12 535 29 28.
It should be noted that it recently became known that OPEC will be represented at COP29 in Baku.
